item.title: News about Microcks
item.description: Fresh Releases Microcks core 1.0.0 on 11 Aug 2020 We are very pleased to announce the Microcks release 1.0.0! The major announcement is the support of AsyncAPI for Event-driven APIs, A lot of security enhancements including major components versions bump, better Keycloak reuse and container images systematic scanning. Check out our Medium release notes! You can also check GitHub milestone for the full list of closed issues. 0.9.2 on 19 May 2020 Version 0.
